alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 25 at 3:02PM MST until December 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Pueblo Vicinity and Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet, La Junta Vicinity and Otero County, and Eastern Las Animas County Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
